about_the_game:
This is a 2D story-oriented horror game setting in the late Victorian era. In the world of this game, you will be a 15-year-old girl named Ace Taffy, who is searching for answers in the town full of mysteries. The heroine will be venture through a series of events, as an ordinary high school student. her personality, identity, ideals and the story of her and the people around will also slowly unfold in the exploration.

This game has an attractive worldview and an original plot setting, with the wonderful story written by the heroine herself, and an elaborate design of the game map. As an approachable student, you can also get into the character better, and learn more about the world of Ace Taffy through your exploration and dialogue.

This game has exquisite character drawings and moving plot insets, bringing a better audio-visual experience while playing. The flow of this game has a high degree of narrative freedom, and the puzzles can be solved in different ways. In the follow-up story of this game, two different routes can be chosen: science and psychic, with a visible plot tendency. In each of the main events, there are two distinct approaches, and each choice leads the player to a different storyline layer by layer.

The game is still under development, and any suggestions, comments and bug feedbacks are welcome.

name: 1883 Science & Mediumship Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

short_description: Welcome to a Victorian town where you'll explore this world through the eyes of a runaway high school girl. Starting off with waking up in a haunted house! A freak is haunting the school?! The town at night is creepy too! The high school girl Taffy will experience a series of supernatural stories
